data.message:
Hello, Facebook at its primary years was very simple easy to use, now its very complicated in all its products, we're finding Instagram better for its simplicity in details including timeline and other features, Facebook has lots lots of duplicated details from left corner to right corner either on personal account or - in the worst ever - the Pages.
I highly recommend to treat Facebook as if its Twitter or Instagram to make our experience more enjoyable, P.S. I'm writing on behalf of a group of 9 people that agreed to the same .Thank you.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Bilal. We truly appreciate all feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2dYUObS. -Joe
Bilal, I agree with Facebook's response. Your suggestion was extremely vague. If you could offer some more specific suggestions, it might be more useful.
